alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 10:52AM EDT until March 26 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lee County in central South Carolina... Clarendon County in central South Carolina... East central Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1052 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alcolu, or near Manning, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Manning, Summerton, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Turbeville, Mayesville, Lynchburg, St. Paul, Brogdon, Foreston, Gable, Davis Station and Shiloh. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 100 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
